caption: Two people are drinking water, with a group of people nearby talking on the phone and doing various things while keeping an eye on them. One man is eating noodles, and he finds these two people drinking water. At this moment, a woman and a little girl arrive. The man turns and leaves, heading to a subway station. He boards the subway. An employee in an office is making a phone call. He goes to the window with the phone. Two men are standing on the rooftop. Downstairs, a group of cars has arrived with many people. Suddenly, chaos breaks out in the office, and everyone rushes out. A group of people enters the building. Many people are running in the stairwell. A man runs out of the building and gets into a taxi.

breakpoint.answer: On the street in the city.
